caseTitle: Amina Masood Janjua v. The State through M/o Interior and others
tagline: Lists of the internees confined in Internment Centres in FATA and PATA, with details about their involvement in the criminal cases (if any) and why they are not being proceeded against, may be filed. SOPs be prepared and focal persons be appointed, preferably to be the District and Sessions Judges of the areas where Internment Centres are situated or otherwise the Political Agents or the Deputy Commissioners would themselves be focal persons, who would be responsible to manage the meeting of the relatives with the internees according to rules without any inconvenience. A report regarding medical treatment to the detenues be also called from both the Secretaries FATA and PATA.
